name: Realmscape
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

In Realmscape, 3 players team up to rid an ancient dungeon of hordes of monsters. The 4th player is the omniscient dungeon keeper who can use his powers to invoke, strengthen and possess his minions.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity 3D
Number of players: 4

Game Designer: Dominic LACHANCE-ROBIDOUX, Nicolas LEFORT & Tristan LEVESQUE
 3D Generalist/Technical Artist: Coline BLEUSE
Game / Level Designer: Quentin LEMIEUX
3D Character Artist: Dominique SON
Enviro/props Artist: Florian CHASTRES
